results.name: Number of odd divisors in A156552(n): a(1) = 0, for n > 1, a(n) = A001227(A156552(n)) = A000005(A322993(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4473
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: (PARI) A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 20 2019
